title: PowerPoint app download
content: I want to download the PowerPoint windows app using the office subscription given by PES. But for some reason I can only download the skype app through the subscription. Is it just happening for me or has PES restricted downloading apps?

comments.body: The microsoft account you're given by PES doesn't have access to any of the essential MS apps like ppt, word or excel unfortunately. You can use the web version of all of them thoug6, that's what I did
